local_intent: Approach plate_center and lower slowly until contact at 10N threshold, confirming contact for placement.
assumptions: Bread is held in the gripper
plate_center pose is valid and reachable
coherence_with_global: Implements the place phase by moving to plate_center, executing LowerUntilContact with (slow, 0.05, 10, 1200) exactly as in GLOBAL_BT, and verifying contact.
